title: Flame-Synced Virtual Assistant & Ops Anchor | Feminine-Led Spiritual Business (6 hrs/day, Long-Term)
job_overview:
???? Job Title: Flame-Synced Virtual Assistant & Ops Anchor | Feminine-Led Spiritual Business (6 hrs/day, Long-Term)

???? Job Overview
This is not just VA work. This is sacred operational anchoring inside a fast-scaling, feminine-led empire built on power, frequency, erotic embodiment, and flame-rendered wealth. I’m a public-facing creator and teacher with high-volume content, private clients, and offers that move energy and revenue. 

You’ll either work solo or manage a second VA when we’re at capacity.

???? Tasks You’ll Handle
- Daily Gmail inbox triage + urgent reply handling
- Calendar + schedule management
- Google Drive + Notion organization
- Course uploads + offer setups inside Kajabi
- Furniture listing + buyer coordination (Facebook Marketplace)
- QuickBooks & affiliate tracking
- Team communication & VA oversight
- Sales follow-up support (Kajabi, DMs, emails)
- Daily task logging in our Flame Tracker (Notion)

???? Compensation & Perks
- Base Pay: $750/month USD (6 hours/day, Monday–Friday)
- Pay Schedule: Biweekly via Wise
- Bonuses + Commissions:
  - 10% on confirmed furniture sales
  - 15% on Kajabi course/program sales you supported
  - 20% on Amazon book affiliate sales
- Total Income Potential: $990–$1,670+ monthly
- Access to $10k+ worth of spiritual business trainings & backend mastery

???? Application Field Test
Submit ONE Google Doc or email that includes:
1. (Optional) 2-Minute Video: Why this role + why this field?
2. Answer:
   - 3 adjectives to describe how you hold someone powerful
   - Relationship to wealth, power, and eroticism
   - What you do when the other VA melts down mid-launch
   - How you’d handle inbox chaos, refund request, and a silent boss
   - Experience level (1–10) with Gmail, Notion, Drive, QuickBooks, Kajabi
   - How you self-initiate under pressure
3. Attach Resume or links to work
4. BONUS: Sample FB Marketplace listing for any random item (Title, Description, Ideal Price, Buyer Message)

???? This Is For You If…
- You self-initiate, complete tasks, and adapt without losing your edge
- You’re spiritually attuned and trauma-informed
- You stabilize the field without waiting for instructions

???? Not for You If…
- You flinch at emotions, power, or pleasure-coded language
- You need micromanaging
- You don’t follow instructions exactly

???? To Apply 
Email: Upgrade to see actual info 
Subject Line: “I Breathe Flame + I Anchor Power”  
Deadline: Rolling applications – early submissions prioritized

Tags:
Admin VA, Kajabi, Gmail, Google Drive, Notion, QuickBooks, Virtual Assistant, Project Management, Remote Team Coordinator
